name: pins-data-model
description: JSON Schemas for the Planning Inspectorate's Data Model

scripts.gen: npm run gen-docs && npm run gen-enums && npm run gen-types && npm run gen-cjs
scripts.gen-cjs: npx rollup ./src/index.js --file ./src/index.cjs --format cjs && npx rollup ./src/enums.js --file ./src/enums.cjs --format cjs
